body_html:
the ticket was closed because there's literally nothing we can actually do about this problem.
CUDA support on OSX is a nightmare, particular versions of cli tools are needed, coupled with particular versions of CUDA.
One option is to upgrade your CUDA to 9.0 / 9.1 and see if that helps.

body:
the ticket was closed because there's literally nothing we can actually do about this problem.
CUDA support on OSX is a nightmare, particular versions of cli tools are needed, coupled with particular versions of CUDA.
One option is to upgrade your CUDA to 9.0 / 9.1 and see if that helps.
